text: Did Blake Shelton perform in his underwear on The Voice? Well, according to Ellen Degeneres he did... haha Ellen and her team had some fun in editing with Blake and Gwen Stefani's performance on the show. Gwen appeared on Ellen and chatted about her "Sexiest Man Alive."
title: WATCH: Blake Shelton Performs In Underwear?! Sorta...
